record.title: CONFERENCE REPORT ON H.R. 1495, WATER RESOURCES DEVELOPMENT ACT OF 2007
record.chair: The unfinished business is the question on adoption of the conference report on H.R. 1495, on which the yeas and nays were ordered.
record.narrative: The Clerk read the title of the bill.
record.chair: The question is on the conference report.

speaking-unknown-id.title: Mr.
speaking-unknown-id.name: SMITH
speaking-unknown-id.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, on rollcall No. 790. I was detained in a meeting. Had I been present, I would have voted "yes."
